item.title: Google 密碼管理器將可與家人共享密碼
item.description:
Google 密碼管理器將可以與伴侶或子女共享密碼。Google 並未透露該功能的發佈時間。要使用此功能，賬戶必須已經使用 Family Link 登錄，這是 Google 的家庭管理系統，允許父母管理子女的手機。該選項的目的之一是在父母之間或父母與子女之間快速交換例如學校系統的密碼。許多密碼管理器已經具備了與其他用戶共享密碼的選項。

Google Password Manager will allow users to share passwords with their partners or children. Google has not disclosed the release date for this feature. To use this functionality, the account must already be logged in with Family Link, Google’s family management system that allows parents to manage their children’s phones. One of the purposes of this option is to facilitate the quick exchange of passwords, such as school system passwords, between parents or between parents and children. Many password managers already have options to share passwords with other users.

item.title: 蘋果 Vision Pro 曝重大疏漏：忘記密碼需重置設備
item.description:
購買了蘋果混合現實頭顯 Apple Vision Pro 的用戶發現，如果忘記了該頭顯的密碼，他們將不得不把設備送回蘋果商店或運回蘋果，才能重置密碼。這裏説的密碼並非 Apple ID 電子郵箱和密碼，而是實際訪問 Vision Pro 時需要輸入的一組數字。消費者必須牢記這組密碼，一旦忘記，頭顯需要完全恢復出廠設置，用戶需要重新下載應用程序並重新設置 Vision Pro。據悉，大量相關的抱怨已經湧入蘋果的客戶支持部門，服務人員為沒有做好應對而致歉。蘋果公司尚未就此問題進行迴應。

Users who have purchased the Apple mixed reality headset, Apple Vision Pro, have discovered that if they forget the password for the headset, they will have to send the device back to an Apple store or ship it to Apple to have the password reset. The password referred to here is not the Apple ID email and password but a set of numbers required to access the Vision Pro itself. Consumers must remember this password, as forgetting it would require a complete factory reset of the headset, leading users to have to re-download applications and reconfigure the Vision Pro. Numerous complaints regarding this issue have reportedly flooded Apple’s customer support department, and Apple has apologized for not being adequately prepared to address the problem. The company has not yet responded to this issue.

item.title: 去中心化社交應用 Bluesky 全面開放用戶註冊
item.description:
軟餐獲悉，去中心化的社交媒體應用程序 Bluesky 全面開放了用戶註冊（Play 商店）。現在任何人無需邀請即可註冊賬號。在開放註冊之前，該應用增強了其基礎設施和內容審核能力。Bluesky 於 2023 年 3 月推出，一直以來採用邀請制模式，此前超過 300 萬註冊了該應用。Bluesky 官方還宣佈，未來幾周或幾個月將推出一些新功能，包括：為想要進一步審核其 Feed 的用戶提供標籤服務、允許開發者和其他組織使用自己的審核規則創建自己的 Bluesky 服務器、提供類似於 X 的收費額外功能等。

The decentralized social media application Bluesky has opened up user registration to the public. Now anyone can sign up for an account without needing an invitation. Prior to opening up registration, the app enhanced its infrastructure and content moderation capabilities. Launched in March 2023, Bluesky had been operating on an invitation-only basis and attracted over 3 million registrations. Bluesky’s official announcement also revealed that new features will be rolled out in the coming weeks or months, including labeling services for users who want to further moderate their feed, allowing developers and other organizations to create their own Bluesky servers with their own moderation rules, and offering additional paid features similar to X.

item.title: Z-Library 現在可以高效地推薦圖書
item.description:
電子書網站 Z-Library 週一宣佈改進了其圖書推薦系統。新的系統可幫助讀者找到真正符合您興趣的圖書。Z-Library 介紹説，以前，其圖書推薦僅基於用戶行為，但這種方法存在侷限，例如它無法為稀有或不受歡迎的圖書生成推薦。為此該網站開發了自己的技術，可以在數百萬本圖書中找到相似的文本，並將其應用於推薦模塊中。現在，在生成推薦時，除了考慮用戶行為，還會用到其獨特的文本比較技術。這意味着在選擇推薦圖書時，Z-Library 會分析圖書內容，以提供更準確、多樣化的建議。

Z-Library 同時再次提醒避免訪問兩個仿冒網站，分別是 z-lib[.] io 和 z-lib[.] id。

The e-book website Z-Library announced on Monday that it has improved its book recommendation system. The new system is designed to help readers find books that truly match their interests. According to Z-Library, the previous book recommendations were solely based on user behavior, but this approach had limitations, such as the inability to generate recommendations for rare or unpopular books. To address this, the website developed its own technology to find similar texts among millions of books and implemented it in the recommendation module. Now, when generating recommendations, Z-Library takes into account not only user behavior but also its unique text comparison technology. This means that when selecting recommended books, Z-Library analyzes the content of the books to provide more accurate and diverse suggestions.

Z-Library also reminds users to avoid accessing two fraudulent websites, namely z-lib[.] io and z-lib[.] id.

item.title: 近七成 iPhone 安裝了 iOS 17
item.description:
蘋果披露了 iOS 17 和 iPadOS 17 的安裝數據。據 developer.apple.com 網站，截至 2024 年 2 月 4 日：

  • iOS 17
    • 在 App Store 上交易的所有 iPhone 中，有 66% 安裝了 iOS 17。23% 仍在運行 iOS 16，其餘 11% 仍在運行 iOS 15 及更早版本。
    • 過去四年推出的所有 iPhone（iPhone 15、iPhone 14、iPhone 13、iPhone 12 和 iPhone SE 系列）中，76% 的設備運行 iOS 17，20% 運行 IOS 16 ，4% 使用 iOS 15 及更早版本。
  • iPadOS 17
    • 53% 的註冊 iPad 設備運行 iPadOS 17，29% 運行 iPadOS 16，18% 的設備運行舊版本。
    • 過去四年中發佈的 iPad 中，61% 運行 iPadOS 17，29% 運行 iPadOS 16，10% 運行舊版本。
